name: combinatoricsjs
description: Combinatorics.js is a standalone math library for Javascript and Node.js. It features a solution to work with Permutations, Posets, Trees, and other enumerative collections.
author: Devan Patel <devanppatel92@@gmail.com> (https://github.com/devanp92)

scripts.coverage:
istanbul cover _mocha -- test --recursive; echo "
Coverage report is available at ./coverage/lcov-report/index.html"
